title: PM launches final anti-polio campaign of 2024
content:
LAHORE, Dec 15 (APP):Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif inaugurated the final anti-polio campaign of the year by administering drops to children at a ceremony on Sunday.
The seven-day drive, which begins on Monday, aims to vaccinate 23.3 million children across Punjab, marking a crucial step in the governmentâ€™s ongoing efforts to eradicate polio.
This concluding drive of 2024 will involve 85,000 mobile teams, working tirelessly to reach every child across urban and rural areas of the province.
